mapper.select: SELECT PROJECT_NO, PROJECT_NAME, IMAGE, TARGET_AMOUNT, PROJECT_DEADLINE, TO_CHAR((TO_DATE(PROJECT_DEADLINE, 'YYYY.MM.DD')+7), 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS SCHEDULED_PAYMENT_DATE, PROJECT_PROGRESS_RATE(#{projectNo}) AS PROJECT_PROGRESS_RATE, STORY, INTRODUCTION_VIDEO, INTRODUCTION_IMAGE, DELIVERY_DATE, CATEGORY_CODE, SUPPORT_PICK_YN, CODE_NAME AS PROGRESS FROM PROJECT JOIN COMMON_CODE ON PROJECT.PROGRESS = COMMON_CODE.CODE WHERE PROJECT_NO = #{projectNo} AND COMMON_CODE.CODE_GROUP='C03'
SELECT NVL((SUM(INVESTMENT_AMOUNT)), '0') AS TOTAL_INVEST_AMOUNT, NVL((COUNT(*)), '0') AS HEADCOUNT FROM INVEST WHERE PROJECT_NO = #{projectNo}
SELECT PRESENT_NO, PRESENT_NAME, PRESENT_PRICE FROM PRESENT WHERE PROJECT_NO = #{projectNo} ORDER BY PRESENT_NO
SELECT COUNT(*) AS REWARD_SELECT_COUNT FROM INVEST WHERE PROJECT_NO = #{projectNo} GROUP BY PRESENT_NO ORDER BY PRESENT_NO
